details.arabic_diacless: بسم اللٰه ولجنا، وبسم اللٰه خرجنا، وعلى اللٰه ربنا توكلنا
details.arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللّٰهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللّٰهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
details.transliteration: Bismillaahi walajnaa, wa bismillaahi kharajnaa, wa 'alaaRabblnaa tawakkalnaa
details.translations: In the Name of Allah we enter, in the Name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we depend
details.bottom: Then say As-Salaamu 'Alaykum to those present.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 4/325. Muslim 2018 states that one should mention the Name of Allah when entering the home and when beginning to eat; and that the devil, hearing this, says: 'There is no shelter for us here tonight and no food.
